resources.string: Error loading databases.\nThis application requires superuser access.

This application requires root access!

You can use this application to change the color of your accounts in the HTC mail-app. Colors in the HTC calendar-app and HTC task-app will then also be changed.

Please close these applications before proceeding. Use on your own risk.
This application will only work if the htc mail app (com.htc.android.mail) is installed.
Failed to update calendar and/or task colors. Mail colors may have been updated regardless.
Something unexpected happened and caused the app process to crash.\n\nPlease email a bug report with the information below.
Please describe exactly what you have been doing before the error occured:
